examples.example: 我为朋友精心准备了一份特别的礼物。

translate.english: I carefully prepared a special gift for my friend.

examples.example: 我收到了一份充满惊喜的礼物，心里特别开心。

translate.english: I received a gift full of surprises and was extremely happy in my heart.

examples.example: 我给父母写了一份充满爱意的信，表达我对他们的感恩之情。

translate.english: I wrote a letter full of love to my parents to express my gratitude to them.
